src:
Paqueta Beber Perbedaan Milan Era Pioli dengan Era Giampaolo
01 Nov 2019, 21:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang AC Milan Lucas Paqueta mengungkapkan bahwa saat ini tak ada lagi kebingungan yang dirasakan pemain di klub setelah Marco Giampaolo pergi dan digantikan Stefano Pioli.
Giampaolo didatangkan untuk mengisi posisi yang ditinggalkan oleh Gennaro Gattuso. Ia diharap bisa mengubah Rossoneri jadi lebih baik tentunya.
Sayangnya Giampolo tak bisa memenuhi ekspektasi itu. Ia akhirnya didepak setelah 111 hari berada di San Siro.
Ia kemudian digantikan oleh Stefano Pioli. Eks pelatih Inter Milan ini sendiri sebelumnya sempat mendapatkan penolakan dari para Milanisti.
text:
Paqueta Beber Difference between Milan in the Pioli Era and the Giampaolo Era
Nov 1 2019, 21:25 by Bola.net
AC Milan midfielder Lucas Paqueta has revealed that there is currently no more confusion felt by players at the club after Marco Giampaolo left and was replaced by Stefano Pioli.
Giampaolo was brought in to fill the position left by Gennaro Gattuso. He is expected to change the Rossoneri for the better of course.
Unfortunately Giampolo could not meet these expectations. He was finally kicked out after 111 days at the San Siro.
He was later replaced by Stefano Pioli. The former Inter Milan coach himself had previously been rejected by the Milanists.
